actions.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Ms. Pryce (OH).
On agreeing to the Pryce (OH) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 182 (Roll no. 196).

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute governs the consideration of H.R. 1905, Legislative Branch Appropriations for FY 2000.
purpose: An amendment to make technical changes and make in order an amendment to be offered by Mr. Young of Florida or his designee.
